      • OutputNeuron

        public OutputNeuron​(double error,
                    double value,
                    java.util.ArrayList<NeuralConnection> inputs,
                    double bias)
        Creates an Output Neuron
        Parameters:
        error - value used to calculate how far off from expectation the neuron is preforming
        value - value calculated that is outputted from this Neuron
        inputs - ArrayList of Neural Connections to this neuron
        bias - bias to this neuron

      • OutputNeuron
